ags:resource.dc:title: Abundance and distribution of the main commercial fish on the northern coast of Spain (ICES Divisions VIIIc and IXa) from bottom trawl surveys.
ags:resource.dc:publisher: International Council for the Exploration of the Sea (ICES)
ags:resource.dc:description: From data obtained in Spanish groundfish surveys carried out along the northern continental shelf of the Iberian peninsula, the temporal evolution of abundance index of main demersal species of comrnercial interest is studied, and also geographical and batimetric distribution of these species to identify rnain areas of abundance. These results are compared with inforrnation collected from comrnercial fishing.
ags:resource.dc:identifier: Sánchez, F. ; Pereiro, F.J.; Rodríguez-Marín, E.1991. Abondance and distribution of the main commercial fish on the northern coast of Spain (ICES Divisions VIIIc and IXa) from bottom trawl surveys. ICES CM Doc. 1991/G:53 32p.
